wobani.resources

Class Fbo.AttachmentSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.resources.Fbo.AttachmentSlot
  • Enclosing class:
    Fbo

    private class Fbo.AttachmentSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an attachment slot of a FBO. It can store a texture or a RBO.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean draw
      Determines whether this attachment is active to draw.
      private int index
      Color attachment's index, if it isn't a color attachment, it's value is 0.
      private int rbo
      Render Buffer Object's id.
      private Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot slot
      Attachment's slot.
      private Texture2D texture
      Attachment slot's texture attachment.

    • Constructor Summary

      AttachmentSlot(Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot slot, int index)
      Initializes a new AttachmentSlot to the given values.

    • Method Summary

      boolean addAttachment(Fbo.FboAttachmentType type)
      Adds the given type of attachment to the slot if there is no attachment currently in the slot.

      If this attachment is a texture, this method detaches it but doesn't release.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttachmentSlot

        public AttachmentSlot(@NotNull
                      Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot slot,
                      int index)
        Initializes a new AttachmentSlot to the given values.
        Parameters:
        slot - attachment's slot
        index - color attachment's index, if it isn't a color attachment, it can be anything
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - slot can't be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the slot is color attachment, index have to be in the (0;7) interval

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the attachment's index. If the attachment is a attachment attachment it's in the (0;7) interval, 0 otherwise.
        Returns:
        the attachment's index

      • getSlot

        @NotNull
public Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot getSlot()
        Returns the attachment's slot.
        Returns:
        the attachment's slot

      • addAttachment

        @Bind
public boolean addAttachment(@NotNull
                                    Fbo.FboAttachmentType type)
        Adds the given type of attachment to the slot if there is no attachment currently in the slot.
        Parameters:
        type - attachment's type
        Returns:
        true if the attachment added successfully, false otherwise

      • getTextureAttachment

        @Nullable
public Texture2D getTextureAttachment()
        Returns the slot's texture attachment. Returns null if there is no texture attachment.
        Returns:
        the slot's texture attachment

      • isThereAttachment

        public boolean isThereAttachment()
        Returns true if there is a texture or a RBO attachment, false otherwise.
        Returns:

      • isThereAttachment

        public boolean isThereAttachment(@NotNull
                                 Fbo.FboAttachmentType type)
        Returns true if there is attachment in this slot and it's type is the same as the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        type - attachment's type
        Returns:
        true if there is attachment in this slot and it's type is the same as the given parameter, false otherwise

        public void removeAttachment()
        Removes the slot's attachment.

        If this attachment is a texture, this method detaches it but doesn't release.
